name: Moving to Planet B
description:
Hi!

This is a shooter game i made for Beginner Circle Jam #3.

 this is also my first game jam

I'd like to hear some feedback about the game :)

- Controls -

WASD : Move

Left Click : Shoot

Esc : Pause

- Story -

Robot almost take over earth, while the apocalypse happen, Space agencies found a habitable planet that humans can go

Now your objective is make your way to the new planet while enemies trying to destroy your spaceship.
